text: @PaulaReidCBS @CDCgov @FaceTheNation Paula (if I can call you by your first name), how does it feel to be an instant celeb!  Quite a show at the Trump campaign rally (Coronavirus "press conference") today!  Keep up the good work!  America appreciates the work of you and your colleagues. 🙂

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Face the Nation
entity.description: "Face the Nation," which is one of the longest-running news programs on the air, offers insight and analysis on the top issues of the day. Moderator Margaret Brennan welcomes politicians, government leaders and international newsmakers to a roundtable discussion of current events with CBS News correspondents.
